name: aspic

a transparent jelly made from animal bones that is used in cold savoury foods: in aspic The centrepiece of the buffet table was a whole salmon in aspic. Melt the aspic in the microwave and spoon a thin coating over the terrine.
More examplesFewer examplesA galantine is typically made of boned meat wrapped around forcemeat, poached, coated in aspic, and served cold.Other popular appetizers include various meats, vegetables, or fish in aspic.Small pieces of aspic cut into decorative shapes can be used to decorate a cold dish.
